About the role As a Software Co-op Student at 4AG Robotics, you will become an integral part of our software development team. You'll contribute to the design, development, testing, and deployment of software systems that power our robotic harvesters. Whether you're working on back-end architecture, computer vision, robot controls, or user interfaces, your contributions will have a direct impact on our technology and our customers. This is a hands-on role where you will be expected to take initiative, learn quickly, and work collaboratively with teammates across engineering disciplines.
